actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, and Rural Development

official_title: To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.
short_title: Rural Electrification Administration Management Improvement Act of 1992

summary.text: Rural Electrification Administration Management Improvement Act of 1992 - Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to repeal the borrower authority to determine the term of telephone loans. Directs the Administrator of the Rural Electrification Administration and the Governor of the Rural Telephone Bank to issue regulations regarding borrower use of excess funds. Revises provisions regarding: (1) direct or insured loan prepayment provisions; and (2) retirement of class A stock.

titles.title: Rural Electrification Administration Management Improvement Act of 1992
To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936.
